actions_taken: Drafted requirements from roadmap entry (v1 — wrong concept)
Deep-dived threaded output mechanism, feature flags, adapter coupling
Rewrote artifacts after user feedback — control room = existing channels + threaded output
Identified char_offset Telegram coupling as core technical blocker
Confirmed help-desk-discord dependency is now delivered
Expanded scope: threaded output for ALL Discord sessions, not just help desk channels
Full scope rewrite (v4): Discord admin observation layer, project channel mapping, personal workspaces, member channels, Telegram filtering, threaded-only output for Discord
Rewrote requirements.md with R1-R11 covering full vision
Rewrote implementation-plan.md with 7 phases matching all 11 requirements
Added routing model (v5): role-based channel resolution matrix, admin-on-help-desk invariant, response routing clarification
Gap analysis (v6): bidirectional observation threads, multi-channel fan-out (R12), observation thread inbound routing (R7), trusted_dirs registration (R5). 12 requirements, 13 tests.
